mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ridx,rtype,rprice,lidx,lodgingname,limagename,avgrv FROM (SELECT rm.ridx ,rm.rtype ,rm.rprice ,l.lidx ,l.lodgingname ,l.limagename ,TRUNC (rv.avgrv,1) AS avgrv FROM roomtb rm ,(SELECT ridx, AVG(rvsatisfaction) AS avgrv FROM reviewtb GROUP BY ridx) rv,lodgingtb l WHERE rm.ridx = rv.ridx AND l.lidx = rm.lidx AND ROWNUM <= 18 ORDER by rv.avgrv DESC))
